title: Galti
overview: Galti is a 2019 Hindi erotic thriller film featuring Arun Kant Yadav, Mohan G Mahto and Anushka Shrivastava. The movie, directed by Bande Prasad and Produced by Mohan G Mahto and Santosh Vishwakrma under their banners Arts Productions and Om Art respectively. shoot in 35 days Nepal and Mumbai.
